abilities.description:
When you score a hit with a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash} with this hammer, mark this module as charged.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash} with your charged hammer, you may release the stored kinetic energy. If you release the energy on a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike}, count a miss as a weak hit. If you release the energy on a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash}, count a weak hit as a strong hit. After you resolve the move, the hammer loses its charge.
